item.title: 无畏的华尔街交易员拒绝因关税战而恐慌
item.description: 本周，关税、通胀和美联储的头条新闻瞬息万变，华尔街处理戏剧性事件的能力再次得到锻炼。事实再次证明，交易员们能够胜任这项任务。【原文：Wall Street’s capacity to process drama got another workout in a week of rapid-fire headlines on tariffs, inflation and the Federal Reserve. Traders proved equal to the task, once again.】

item.title: 巴菲特抛售更多美国银行股票，同时保持苹果股份不变
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. continued whittling a longtime bet on Bank of America Corp. in last year’s final months, while keeping a stake in Apple Inc. intact following an earlier reduction.】

item.title: OpenAI 董事会拒绝马斯克以 974 亿美元收购公司控制权的请求
item.description: OpenAI 董事会正式拒绝了由埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的投资者集团提出的以 974 亿美元收购这家控制人工智能公司的非营利组织的提议。【原文：OpenAI’s board of directors has formally rejected an offer from a group of investors led by Elon Musk to buy the nonprofit that controls the artificial intelligence company for $97.4 billion.】

item.title: 对冲基金看涨铜的赌注达到 10 月以来最高点
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能对红色金属征收关税，资金经理们将看涨铜的赌注提高到了 10 月份以来的最高点。【原文：Money managers boosted their bullish wagers on copper to the highest since October due to concerns over potential tariffs on the red metal by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德搬迁纽约成了卡尼的政治攻击线
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）决定将其总部从多伦多迁往纽约，这在一则针对马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的新攻击广告中得到了体现，马克-卡尼正在竞选加拿大总理。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.’s decision to shift its head office to New York from Toronto is featured in a new attack ad against Mark Carney, who’s running to become Canadian prime minister.】

item.title: 特朗普誓言为纽约人完成宪法管道工程
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言要完成停滞已久的宪法管道工程，将天然气输送到纽约，并称该工程可将美国东北部各州的能源价格降低多达 70%。【原文：President Donald Trump vowed to complete the long-stalled Constitution Pipeline that would transport natural gas to New York, saying it could slash energy prices in northeastern US states by as much as 70%.】

item.title: 美联储洛根称通胀率下降不能保证降息
item.description: 达拉斯联邦储备银行行长洛里-洛根（Lorie Logan）敦促政策制定者在未来数月保持谨慎，重申通胀下降不一定会促使进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas President Lorie Logan urged policymakers to remain cautious in the coming months, reiterating lower inflation wouldn’t necessarily prompt further interest-rate reductions.】

item.title: 爆米花品牌 LesserEvil 考虑出售价值 10 亿美元的产品
item.description: 知情人士透露，爆米花和零食品牌 LesserEvil 正在探索潜在的出售方案。【原文：Popcorn and snack brand LesserEvil is exploring a potential sale, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 机器人初创公司 Figure AI 正洽谈新一轮融资，估值达 395 亿美元
item.description:
在 OpenAI 和微软的支持下，Figure 正在讨论一轮 15 亿美元的融资。【原文：

Backed by OpenAI and Microsoft, Figure is discussing a $1.5 billion funding round. 

】

item.title: 高盛的明尼斯称，利率不确定性阻碍了并购交易
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The long-awaited uptick in mergers and acquisitions is still being held back by uncertainty over the direction of interest rates, even as corporate borrowers have access to cheaper financing, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s global head of credit and asset finance.】

item.title: 债券落后于国债，成为 11 月以来最便宜的债券
item.description: 相对于国债而言，长期市政债券是 11 月以来最便宜的，因为美国各州和地方债务市场的投资者正面临着税收政策问题，并消化着不断膨胀的发行量。【原文：Long-maturity municipal bonds are the cheapest since November relative to Treasuries as investors in the market for US state and local debt confront questions around tax policy and absorb swelling issuance.】

item.title: 特朗普称将在 4 月 2 日前后对汽车征收新关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将宣布对汽车征收新的关税，这是他在寻求重塑美国贸易关系的过程中又一次大规模征收进口关税。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would unveil new tariffs on automobiles, adding to his wave of sweeping import levies as he seeks to remake US trade relationships.】

item.title: ETF IQ：单一股票基金爆炸的独特可能性
item.description: 欢迎收看 ETF IQ，这是一份专门报道 14 万亿美元全球 ETF 行业的周报。我是彭博新闻社记者兼主播凯蒂-格雷菲尔德（Katie Greifeld）。【原文：Welcome to ETF IQ, a weekly newsletter dedicated to the $14 trillion global ETF industry. I'm Bloomberg News reporter and anchor Katie Greifeld.】

item.title: 秘鲁电信公司在出售失败后宣布破产
item.description: Telefonica SA 的秘鲁分部周五表示，由于未能找到买家，该公司已启动破产程序，以重组其财务和业务。【原文：Telefonica SA’s Peruvian unit said Friday that it has begun an insolvency process in a bid to restructure its finances and operations after failing to find a buyer.】

item.title: Wamco 在重大养老金赎回中从 Calstrs 损失 10 亿美元
item.description: 美国第二大养老金机构加利福尼亚州教师退休系统（California State Teachers' Retirement System）正在从西部资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：The California State Teachers’ Retirement System, the second-biggest US pension, is pulling its roughly $1 billion investment from Western Asset Management Co. as a reckoning continues over criminal fraud charges against the bond manager’s star trader Ken Leech.】

item.title: 雪佛龙在特朗普与马杜罗重启关系之际加大委内瑞拉石油出口量
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）计划将委内瑞拉的石油出口量提高到七年来的最高水平，因为委内瑞拉与美国关系的重启缓解了人们对贸易限制将增加的担忧。【原文：Chevron Corp. plans to ratchet up oil exports from Venezuela to a seven-year high as a reset of the country’s relationship with the US eases concerns that trade restrictions will increase.】

item.title: 前助手称 CFPB 清理工作将删除敏感银行数据
item.description: 美国消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）前首席技术专家在一份法律文件中声称，特朗普政府即将删除一个包含敏感金融信息的数据库。【原文：The former chief technologist of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau alleged in a legal filing that the Trump administration is on the verge of deleting a database with sensitive financial information, as concerns mount over billionaire Elon Musk’s efforts to dismantle federal agencies.】

item.title: 特朗普让欧洲为乌克兰买单
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，我们将讨论共和党人对美国承诺的反悔如何在欧洲引起震动，但并不令人意外。【原文：

In this episode of Trumponomics, we discuss how the Republican’s about-face on US commitments is sending shockwaves through Europe—but not surprise.

】

item.title: 数据和关税削弱看涨观点，美元跌至 2025 年低点
item.description: 由于1月份零售销售数据疲软以及美国关税政策的不确定性，美元进一步走强的共识裂痕扩大，美元指数跌至一年新低。【原文：A gauge of the dollar fell to a fresh year low, as weak January retail sales data and uncertainty over US tariff policy widened cracks in the consensus for further strength in the currency.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 讨论以 750 亿美元的估值融资 100 亿美元
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能公司 xAI 正在为一轮约 100 亿美元的融资拉拢潜在投资者，该轮融资将使公司估值达到约 750 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence company xAI is canvassing potential investors for a roughly $10 billion funding round that would value the company at about $75 billion, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 应特朗普团队要求，台积电考虑运营英特尔美国工厂
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士透露，应特朗普政府官员的要求，台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. is considering taking a controlling stake in Intel Corp.’s factories at the request of Trump administration officials, a person familiar with the matter said, as the president looks to boost American manufacturing and maintain US leadership in critical technologies.】

item.title: 美国股市称霸世界的内幕
item.description:
在本期Trillions节目中，我们将深入探讨它继续攀升的原因、它的成功可能会如何结束以及未来的竞争可能来自哪里。【原文：

In this episode of Trillions, we dig into why it continues to climb, how its success may end and where future competition may come from.

】

item.title: 戴尔与埃隆-马斯克的 xAI 公司达成 50 亿美元人工智能服务器交易
item.description: 戴尔科技公司（Dell Technologies Inc. ）已进入后期阶段，将达成一项价值超过 50 亿美元的交易，为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 公司提供专为人工智能工作优化的服务器。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. is in advanced stages of securing a deal worth more than $5 billion to provide Elon Musk’s xAI with servers optimized for artificial intelligence work.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会（CFTC）举报人主管被任命为该机构最高执法监察官
item.description: 商品期货交易委员会周五宣布，该机构的最高执法职位将由监管机构举报人办公室前主任布莱恩-杨（Brian Young）接任。【原文：The Commodity Futures Trading Commission’s top enforcement job will go to Brian Young, the former head of the regulator’s whistleblower office, the agency announced Friday.】

item.title: 电子游戏制作人在拉斯维加斯寻找希望
item.description:
在一年一度的 DICE 大会上，游戏制造商们表示，复苏之路仍显得 漫长

。【原文：

At the annual DICE convention, game makers said the road to recovery still appears lengthy

】

item.title: 研究人员称间谍组织正瞄准无人机技术制造商
item.description: 嗨，我是约旦。一家安全公司警告说 网络间谍正试图窃取 无人机技术制造商的数据但首先...【原文：Hi, it’s Jordan. A security firm warns that cyber spies are trying to pilfer data from makers of drone technology. But first…】

item.title: Agnico 接近全球第二大黄金矿商的产量目标
item.description: 阿尼科-伊格尔矿业公司（Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. ）有可能从其主要竞争对手手中夺走世界第二大黄金生产商的头衔。【原文：Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. is threatening to snag the title of world’s second-largest gold producer from one of its top rivals.】

item.title: 优步的欧洲竞争对手 Bolt 将在加拿大推出共享汽车服务
item.description: 优步（Uber Technologies Inc. ）的竞争对手、总部位于爱沙尼亚的 Bolt Technology OU 公司正在招募司机，准备在加拿大主要城市推出叫车服务，这是该公司近期进军北美市场的又一举措。【原文：Bolt Technology OU, the Estonia-based rival to Uber Technologies Inc., is recruiting drivers ahead of launching ridehailing services in major Canadian cities, extending a recent push into the North American market.】

item.title: Talk Tuah "播客令人难以置信的兴衰史
item.description:
2024年第四季度，哈利 韦尔奇的节目在全美排名第11

。【原文：

During the fourth quarter of 2024, Haliey Welch’s show ranked No. 11 in the entire US

】

item.title: 英国立法者 "关注 "医院扣留病人问题
item.description: 在彭博新闻社的一项调查之后，一位有影响力的英国立法者对该国投资于拘留病人的营利性医院提出了担忧，她认为这是 "令人不安的模式 "调查结果的一部分。【原文：An influential UK lawmaker has raised concerns about the country’s investment in for-profit hospitals that detain patients, following a Bloomberg News investigation she described as part of a “disturbing pattern” of findings.】
